humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest tumor size in the left breast is 3.5 cm, which falls under the T2 category of cancers that are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in size. Therefore, the predicted T stage for this patient is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the left breast invasive ductal carcinoma measures 3.5 cm in greatest dimension (E, Diagnosis). Therefore, the T stage is T2.
